short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A customiseable password generator to create everything from PIN's to secure, unique passwords!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An easy-to-use password generator that can generate completely unique passwords from a range of parameters you can choose from!

The generator can create unique, customizable passwords or 4-digit PIN numbers depending on which settings you choose to use. To access them, simply click the settings icon up the top right corner of the extension to navigate between tabs.

If you find a password you like, there is a convenient 'Copy' button located on the extension as well, which will immediately copy whatever code has been generated straight to your clipboard!
